description:
runtime: disable crash handler test on netbsd

Disable the crash handler test on NetBSD until I can figure out why
it triggers failures in later tests.

messages.text:
http://codereview.appspot.com/6460090/diff/1002/src/pkg/runtime/crash_test.go
File src/pkg/runtime/crash_test.go (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/6460090/diff/1002/src/pkg/runtime/crash_test.go#newcode27
src/pkg/runtime/crash_test.go:27: // TODO(jsing): figure out why this causes delayed failures on netbsd
maybe we need a tracking issue for these TODOs.

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

On 2012/08/15 15:26:02, minux wrote:
> http://codereview.appspot.com/6460090/diff/1002/src/pkg/runtime/crash_test.go
> File src/pkg/runtime/crash_test.go (right):
> 
> http://codereview.appspot.com/6460090/diff/1002/src/pkg/runtime/crash_test.go#newcode27
> src/pkg/runtime/crash_test.go:27: // TODO(jsing): figure out why this causes
> delayed failures on netbsd
> maybe we need a tracking issue for these TODOs.

Issue 3954 exists for NetBSD:

  http://code.google.com/p/go/issues/detail?id=3954

I've just added a reference to it in the change.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=e9cffec2dc25 ***

runtime: disable crash handler test on netbsd

Disable the crash handler test on NetBSD until I can figure out why
it triggers failures in later tests.

R=golang-dev, minux.ma
CC=golang-dev
